snippet.title: MSX Longplay [090] Zanac-EX
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Charlie9631

It has been a while since the previous MSX longplay was here. You know, OpenMSX is pretty difficult to set up, though...

Anyway, this is the reworked and improved version of the original Zanac on MSX. This is Zanac EX, on MSX2, and with better gameplay and screen scrolling (I actually prefer the NES version the most). Nothing much to say here, other than the fact that there was a warp zone in area 6 at the 2nd boss that warps you BACK to area 2, which the NES version removed. The rule of modulo 64 doesn't work here, apparently...
Anyway, enjoy! -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
